summary.para: The NL_ROUTER_DISCOVERY_BEHAVIOR enumeration type defines the router discovery behavior, as described in RFC 2461.

remarks.para: For more information about RFC 2461, see the Neighbor Discovery for IP Version 6 (IPv6) memo by the Network Working Group.

summary.para: Router discovery is enabled. This setting is the default value for IPv6.
Router discovery is configured based on DHCP. This setting is the default value for IPv4.
When the properties of an IP interface are being set, the value for router discovery should be unchanged.
